Purpose: To assess intrathecal IgG synthesis for diagnosing central nervous system diseases such as multiple sclerosis.
Container: Sterile container without preservatives for CSF; plain clot tube for serum
Equipment: Centrifuge, micropipettes with tips, IgG and albumin assay kits (ELISA/nephelometry), calibrators and controls, analytical balance, water bath or heating block, refrigerated storage units
